name: 3% | Power Saver
description:
Description

In 3% | Power Saver, you find yourself at an indoor mall with only 3% charge left on your phone. The goal of the game is to find and convince someone to lend you their phone charger. This is harder than it sounds, considering almost nobody in the mall knows you, and may not even have the right type of charger!

Controls
  • Move ——— “WASD”
  • Look ——— Mouse Movement

  • Get NPC’s Attention ——— Left Mouse, or “E”

  • Ask For Charger ——— “1”

  • Make Small Talk ——— “2”
  • Introduce Yourself ——— “3”
  • Insult ——— “4”
